Community¶

class battlenet_client.sc2.community.Community¶
static grandmaster(client, region_tag: str, region_id: int, locale: Optional[str] = None)¶

Returns ladder data for the current season’s grandmaster leaderboard.

Parameters

  • (obj (client) – oauth): OpenID/OAuth instance

  • region_tag (str) – region_tag abbreviation

  • locale (str) – which locale to use for the request

  • region_id (int) – region for the profile, or use sc2.constants

Returns

dict containing info about the grandmaster leaderboard

Return type

dict

static ladder(client, region_tag: str, region_id: int, realm_id: int, profile_id: int, *, ladder_id: Optional[int] = 'summary', locale: Optional[str] = None)¶

Returns a ladder summary, or specific ladder for an individual SC2 profile.

Parameters

  • (obj (client) – oauth): OpenID/OAuth instance

  • region_tag (str) – region_tag abbreviation

  • locale (str) – which locale to use for the request

  • region_id (int) – region for the profile, or use sc2.constants

  • realm_id (int) – the realm of the profile (1 or 2)

  • profile_id (int) – the profile ID

  • ladder_id (int, optional) – the ID of a specific ladder, if desired

Returns

dict containing the requested profile data

Return type

dict

static metadata(client, region_tag: str, region_id: int, realm_id: int, profile_id: int, locale: Optional[str] = None)¶

Returns metadata for an individual’s profile.

Parameters

  • (obj (client) – oauth): OpenID/OAuth instance

  • region_tag (str) – region_tag abbreviation

  • locale (str) – which locale to use for the request

  • region_id (int) – region for the profile, or use sc2.constants

  • realm_id (int) – the realm of the profile (1 or 2)

  • profile_id (int) – the profile ID

Returns

dict containing the requested metadata

Return type

dict

static player(client, region_tag: str, account_id: str, locale: Optional[str] = None)¶

Returns the player data for the provided account_id.

Parameters

  • (obj (client) – oauth): OpenID/OAuth instance

  • region_tag (str) – region_tag abbreviation

  • locale (str) – which locale to use for the request

  • account_id (int) – the account ID to request

Returns

json decoded data of the account

Return type

dict

static profile(client, region_tag: str, region_id: int, realm_id: int, profile_id: int, locale: Optional[str] = None)¶

Returns data about an individual SC2 profile.

Parameters

  • (obj (client) – oauth): OpenID/OAuth instance

  • region_tag (str) – region_tag abbreviation

  • locale (str) – which locale to use for the request

  • region_id (int) – region for the profile, or use sc2.constants

  • realm_id (int) – the realm of the profile (1 or 2)

  • profile_id (int) – the profile ID

Returns

dict containing the requested profile data

Return type

dict

static season(client, region_tag: str, region_id: int, locale: Optional[str] = None)¶

Returns data about the current season.

Parameters

  • (obj (client) – oauth): OpenID/OAuth instance

  • region_tag (str) – region_tag abbreviation

  • locale (str) – which locale to use for the request

  • region_id (int) – region for the profile, or use sc2.constants

Returns

dict containing info about the current season

Return type

dict

static static(client, region_tag: str, *, region_id: Optional[str] = None, locale: Optional[str] = None)¶

Returns all static SC2 profile data (achievements, categories, criteria, and rewards).

Parameters

  • (obj (client) – oauth): OpenID/OAuth instance

  • region_tag (str) – region_tag abbreviation

  • locale (str) – which locale to use for the request

  • region_id (str) – region for the profile, or use sc2.constants (used outside CN only)

Returns

dict containing the static profile data

Return type

dict

class battlenet_client.sc2.community.CommunityCN¶
static achievements(client, region_tag: str, locale: Optional[str] = None)¶

Returns the achievements for Starcraft II

Parameters

  • (obj (client) – oauth): OpenID/OAuth instance

  • region_tag (str) – region_tag abbreviation

  • locale (str) – which locale to use for the request

Returns

json decoded data of the guild’s achievement summary

Return type

dict

static ladder(client, region_tag: str, ladder_id: str, locale: Optional[str] = None)¶

Returns data about an SC2 ladder.

Parameters

  • (obj (client) – oauth): OpenID/OAuth instance

  • region_tag (str) – region_tag abbreviation

  • locale (str) – which locale to use for the request

  • ladder_id (str) – The ID of the ladder to retrieve.

Returns

dict with data of the ladder

Return type

dict

static ladders(client, region_tag: str, profile_id: str, region: str, name: str, locale: Optional[str] = None)¶

Returns data about an individual SC2 profile’s ladders.

Parameters

  • (obj (client) – oauth): OpenID/OAuth instance

  • region_tag (str) – region_tag abbreviation

  • locale (str) – which locale to use for the request

  • profile_id (int) – the profile ID

  • region (str) – region for the profile

  • name (str) – name of the profile

Returns

json decoded data of the profile’s ladders

Return type

dict

static match_history(client, region_tag: str, profile_id: str, region: str, name: str, locale: Optional[str] = None)¶

Returns data about an individual SC2 profile’s match history.

Parameters

  • (obj (client) – oauth): OpenID/OAuth instance

  • region_tag (str) – region_tag abbreviation

  • locale (str) – which locale to use for the request

  • profile_id (int) – the profile ID

  • region (str) – region for the profile

  • name (str) – name of the profile

Returns

json decoded data of the profile’s ladders

Return type

dict

static profile(client, region_tag: str, profile_id: str, region: str, name: str, locale: Optional[str] = None)¶

Retrieves data about an individual SC2 profile.

Notes

This can only be used in the CN region

Parameters

  • (obj (client) – oauth): OpenID/OAuth instance

  • region_tag (str) – region_tag abbreviation

  • locale (str) – which locale to use for the request

  • profile_id (int) – the profile ID

  • region (str) – region for the profile

  • name (str) – name of the profile

Returns

json decoded data of the profile

Return type

dict

  • region_tag (str) – region_tag abbreviation

  • locale (str) – which locale to use for the request

static ladder(client, region_tag: str, region_id: int, ladder_id: int, locale: Optional[str] = None)¶

Returns data about an individual SC2 profile’s match history.

Parameters

  • (obj (client) – oauth): OpenID/OAuth instance

  • region_tag (str) – region_tag abbreviation

  • locale (str) – which locale to use for the request

  • region_id (int) – region for the profile, or use sc2.constants

  • ladder_id (int) – ladder ID for the request

Returns

json decoded data of the profile’s data for the specified ladder

Return type

dict

static ladders(client, region_tag: str, region_id: int, realm_id: int, profile_id: int, locale: Optional[str] = None)¶

Retrieves data about an individual SC2 profile’s ladders.

Parameters

  • region_tag (str) – region_tag abbreviation

  • locale (str) – which locale to use for the request

  • region_id (int) – region for the profile, or use sc2.constants

  • realm_id (int) – the realm of the profile (1 or 2)

  • profile_id (int) – the profile ID

Returns

json decoded data of the profile’s ladders

Return type
